posts.post_title: T202 Triple Folder Athletic Infield sgc 40
posts.post_content: Offered here is a t202 triple folder The Athletic Infield , Hauser Konetchy. It is graded an sgc 40. I am asking 100.00 plus 5.00 for shipping and delivery confirmation. Nice card
